mapper.sql: (select count(r.id) from record r where r.blog_id = b.id and r.type = 0) as up, (select count(r.id) from record r where r.blog_id = b.id and r.type = 1) as down, (select count(r.id) from record r where r.blog_id = b.id and r.type = 2) as star, (select count(r.id) from record r where r.blog_id = b.id and r.type = 3) as views,

sql.if: , 0 as is_up, 0 as is_down, 0 as is_star

mapper.select:
select b.id, b.title, b.description, b.cover,
b.status, b.create_time, b.author_id, u.nickname as author_nickname
from blog b left join user u on u.id = b.author_id
(b.title like concat('%', #{keywords}, '%') or b.description like concat('%', #{keywords}, '%') or b.content like concat('%', #{keywords}, '%'))
group by b.id, b.title, b.description, b.cover, b.create_time
